item.description:
Denis Goddard from the New Hampshire Liberty Alliance has just informed me that Betty Laske, the [far left] former social worker who defeated Sandra in November’s campaign for State Senate, is considered a critical swing vote in the upcoming bill to make seats belts mandatory in New Hampshire. Per Goddard, a very effective tactic to sway Laske would be to flyer her constituents and donors with anti-seatbelt [law] literature thereby alerting Laske to the organized opposition and the unpopularity of the bill.

So here’s the deal:
1. I have the flyers and the maps and addresses/neighborhoods we need to hit
2. I can pick people up, and give rides to and from the locations as necessary
a. Hopefully we’ll have 2-3 cars and can hit different neighborhoods simultaneously
3. I’m shooting for about 3-4 hours on Sunday afternoon
a. This depends of course on how many volunteers I can round up

Thanks,
Brett Powell
item.name: NHLA Pro Seat Belt Freedom Flyer Drop
